item.title: JS: Express.js
item.description:
Express.js is a minimalist and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for building web and mobile applications and APIs.

Setting Up

It’s easy to set up Express.js. If you have .js project, simply:

  • Initializing a Node.js project (npm init).
  • Installing Express.js (npm install express).
